Gadmei TV2836E External TV Card

Gadmei TV2836E External TV Card built-in speaker, 3.55 mm Audio Jack. Here, uses the professional progressive scanning TV (DPTV) chip. In this TV Card, the refresh rate is increased from original 50Hz to 60Hz rate, that supports multiple resolution output. This TV Card is compatible with both CRT monitor and LED/LCD monitor. In addition, this Gadmei TV tuner card comes with a stylish designed and is equipped with a built-in speaker. Connect the TV card to an LED/LCD or CRT computer monitor, and you can easily get a fashionable television. The Gadmei TV2836E External TV Card has no warranty.

full_description:
Wini Q3 2GB/16GB Android 4K Smart TV Stick

The Wini Q3 2GB/16GB Android 4K Smart TV Stick is a powerful and portable device that can turn any TV into a smart TV. It runs on Android 10 OS and has a quad-core A53 processor with Allwinner H313 chipset. It has 2GB of RAM and 16GB of storage for smooth performance and ample space for apps and media. Wini Q3 2GB/16GB Android 4K Smart TV Stick supports 4K resolution for stunning picture quality and WiFi support for wireless connectivity. It also has an Ethernet port for wired internet access and a DC charger for power supply. Wini Q3 2GB/16GB Android 4K Smart TV Stick is easy to use just plug-and-play.
